name: Inverter
documentation:
Interface responsible for converting a domain object into a {@link SerializedDocument} for indexing, and vice versaâ€”deserializing a {@code byte[]} representation into the original object type.

An {@code Inverter} is a specialized {@link Converter} used in the search module. It bridges the gap between serializable objects and searchable document formats. Implementations handle both document creation and deserialization from raw data. @param the type of object that can be inverted and deserialized @see SerializedDocument

methods.name: toDocument
